COMPETITION.Intro: Un concours des Valueurs culture valorisant la femme Africaine
COMPETITION.Intro1: Would you like to experience the Miss Goma Adventure?
COMPETITION.Intro2: Here are the minimum selection criteria:
COMPETITION.Criteria2: Have been born between 1st December 1992 and 1st January 2002;
COMPETITION.Criteria3: Be single without children (neither divorced nor widowed, etc.);
COMPETITION.Criteria4: Be domiciled in the city of Goma

PRIZE.Paragraph: GET YOUR CROWN AND WIN YOUR CAR

PNG.Message: We're sorry, the page you requested could not be found. Please return to the home page or contact support at missgoma2021@gmail.com
